title: Valorous Roland
opening: A mountain cave on the outskirts of Ostia. Here, a sacred weapon lies waiting, the seal guarding it broken. However, to retrieve the weapon, one must pass a trial. A long, seemingly uncrossable distance... Eliwood must overcome the challenge with the help of his friends. Eliwood's true strength will soon be sorely tested.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Listen, Mark. You know how Eliwood is. Never wants to burden anyone else... Takes all responsibility on himself... Now, more than ever, we have to support him. Let's go, Mark!

boss.speaker: Georg
boss.line: …I am one of… Sir Roland’s… warriors…Georg……You trespass here… I will…cut…you down…

boss.speaker: Georg
boss.line: …… …I don’t understand… you seem…familiar… …Who…are…you…? …You and …Sir Roland are as one…

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...You have stood your guard for so, so long. I'm sorry...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Their souls may now rest. ...At long last...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Time for a reunion of sorts. Eliwood, move back.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: My old friend... The little knight, Sir Roland.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Roland... Awaken, and answer my call.

end.speaker: Roland
end.line: ...My friend... Wise, all-seeing Athos...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Good to see you, Roland.

end.speaker: Roland
end.line: I feel much time has passed. Seeing you again... It brings back memories. Fighting the dragons... Old friends... All this time, lost in memory...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: It's been almost a thousand years...and yet, once again, the world is threatened by one who craves the might of dragons.

end.speaker: Roland
end.line: ...The might of dragons?

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Heed my words, Roland. This boy is descended from your blood. Please, lend him your strength.

end.speaker: Roland
end.line: I...no longer have flesh and bone in this world. I cannot... No, wait. Take this. Its blade shall serve as a vessel for my soul's strength.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: ...If you do such a thing, you will pass forever from the reach of this world.

end.speaker: Roland
end.line: And yet my heart will be glad. If I might help my children, there is nothing else I need do. ...I ask that you see this through, my friend...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: I will...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Lord Athos, who was that man?

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: So you were able to see him, too? That was your ancestor, the warrior Roland.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: That was Roland?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Look! Above the altar! A sword...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Take it! It belongs to you now.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...What a wondrous blade.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Durandal. The sword of sacred fire.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: So this is the legendary blade...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Durandal, the sword of sacred fire.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: ...It's strange, isn't it? I've never seen it before, and yet it feels so familiar...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: I will use this to battle Nergal. Come! To the Dragon's Gate... What!? The sword... It's glowing... Watch out! Something's coming...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: It can't be...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: It's a...dragon!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: No!!! How is it possible!?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Get back, everyone!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Eliwood! Are you all right?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: I think so... My body moved on its own. It was as if the sword itself was guiding my arm.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: The sword of sacred fire was made to combat dragons. With so much power, who can say what it might be capable of? But this ice dragon... Surely...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Is something the matter, Lord Athos...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: No...
Let me be the one to answer that.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Blackheart! Nergal!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Ninian proved useless. I've come for a replacement.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Nils!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Don't waste your breath. He won't be awake for some time. Nils will do for me what Ninian would not.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Scum! What have you done with Ninian!?

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: It's not what I've done. It's what you've done, Eliwood.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: What?

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Eliwood, did you never once question it? Why the siblings were needed to open the Dragon's Gate? Why did it have to be Ninian and Nils?

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: The answer is simple. The Dragon's Gate cannot be opened by humans. Why would humans be able to open a gate that was designed...for dragons?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...What?

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: It's pitiful, really. Poor Ninian's plight. Coaxed by my honeyed words, she passed through the gate... Though unable to return home, she refused to aid me and wandered lost and alone, until...she was slain by the hand of the one she loved.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: What... What are you saying?

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Can you not guess? Or is it that you are afraid to know? Very well. Let me tell you, Eliwood. The ice dragon there... The beast slaughtered by your hand... That is Ninian. The girl who adored you. She returned to her true form and lost all human memory. Yet you, above all else, remained in her heart, and she came here... Look upon the creature you have slain. That is Ninian.

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Go on, look. She's using the last of her strength to take human form for one last time. I believe there may be still be time enough to say farewell. You know, of course, that you cannot save her.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Nergal!! You foul demon !!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: It's not me. You, Eliwood. You killed her. You--

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: I... Aaaaaaahhh!!!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Calm down! Get hold of yourself, Eliwood.

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: Lo...Lord Eliwood...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...Ninian?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ninian! Ninian!

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: Eliwood...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ninian... Please don't die... I... What have I done?

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: I'm glad...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: What?

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: That you are unharmed, my lord... I'm so glad...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...Ninian... Ninian? You can't... Answer me... Niniaaaaaaan!!!!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: That's enough. You will await the end of the world trembling in the shadow of dragons!

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: I will not permit it. Instead, I will see you perish in flame!!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: The purest fire... Flame breath. Very impressive, Archsage Athos. However... However, fire is no longer my foe! Look! Not even a legendary blade can cause me harm! At long last, I am impervious! Ha ha...ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!!!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Miserable, aren't you, Athos? Yet out of respect for the great man you used to be, I'll leave. After all, 500 years ago, we followed the same path, did we not, old friend? Ha ha ha ha ha!!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: What do we do now? Not even legendary weapons can stop him!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Nils! You're awake! Are you OK?

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: ...Ninian! ......Ninian. ...Ninian!? Where is my...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...Nils... ...I'm so sorry.

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: ...Uuh... Aaaaaaaaaa!!!!!
